name: Friday Night Funkin' Clay Mod | Web Browser Online Port
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Clay Mod | Web Browser Online Port
description:
Clay is a stiff, sticky fine-grained earth that can be moulded when wet, and is dried and baked to make bricks, pottery, and ceramics.

The downloadable version of the mod, on which this port is based, is available here. All the credit goes to Mrs Boomer.
